 29namespace vsip_csl
 30{
 31namespace dispatcher
 32{
 33#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 34template <>
 35struct List<op::qrd>
 36{
 37  typedef Make_type_list<be::user,
 38			 be::cml,
 39			 be::mercury_sal,
 40			 be::lapack>::type type;
 41};

 46
 47namespace vsip
 48{
 49namespace impl
 50{
 51// Qrd traits.  Determine which QR types (no-save, skinny, full) are
 52// supported.
 53template <typename T>
 54struct Qrd_traits
 55{
 56  static bool const supports_qrd_saveq1  = T::backend_type::supports_qrd_saveq1;
 57  static bool const supports_qrd_saveq   = T::backend_type::supports_qrd_saveq;
 58  static bool const supports_qrd_nosaveq = T::backend_type::supports_qrd_nosaveq;
 59};
 60
 61} // namespace vsip::impl
 62
 63/// QR solver object.
 64template <typename = VSIP_DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE,
 65	  return_mechanism_type ReturnMechanism = by_value>
 66class qrd;
 67
 68// QR solver object (by-reference).
 69template <typename T>
 70class qrd<T, by_reference>
 71{
 72#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 73  typedef typename vsip_csl::dispatcher::Dispatcher<
 74    vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::qrd, T>::type
 75  backend_type;
 76#else
 77  typedef typename impl::cvsip::Qrd<T> backend_type;
 78#endif
 79  friend struct impl::Qrd_traits<qrd<T, by_reference> >;
 80
 81public:
 82  qrd(length_type rows, length_type cols, storage_type st) 
 83  VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
 84  : backend_(rows, cols, st)
 85  {}
 86
 87  length_type  rows()     const VSIP_NOTHROW { return backend_.rows();}
 88  length_type  columns()  const VSIP_NOTHROW { return backend_.columns();}
 89  storage_type qstorage() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return backend_.qstorage();}
 90
 91  template <typename Block>
 92  bool decompose(Matrix<T, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW { return backend_.decompose(m);}
 93
 94  template <mat_op_type tr, product_side_type ps,
 95	    typename Block0, typename Block1>
 96  bool prodq(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b, Matrix<T, Block1> x) VSIP_NOTHROW
 97  { return backend_.prodq<tr, ps>(b, x);}
 98
 99  template <mat_op_type tr, typename Block0, typename Block1>
100  bool rsol(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b, T const alpha, Matrix<T, Block1> x)
101    VSIP_NOTHROW
102  { return backend_.rsol<tr>(b, alpha, x);}
103
104  template <typename Block0, typename Block1>
105  bool covsol(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b, Matrix<T, Block1> x) VSIP_NOTHROW
106  { return backend_.covsol(b, x);}
107
108  template <typename Block0, typename Block1>
109  bool lsqsol(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b, Matrix<T, Block1> x) VSIP_NOTHROW
110  { return backend_.lsqsol(b, x);}
111
112private:
113  backend_type backend_;
114};
115
116// QR solver object (by-value).
117template <typename T>
118class qrd<T, by_value>
119{
120#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
121  typedef typename vsip_csl::dispatcher::Dispatcher<
122    vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::qrd, T>::type
123  backend_type;
124#else
125  typedef typename impl::cvsip::Qrd<T> backend_type;
126#endif
127  friend struct impl::Qrd_traits<qrd<T, by_value> >;
128
129public:
130  qrd(length_type rows, length_type cols, storage_type st) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
131    : backend_(rows, cols, st)
132    {}
133
134  length_type  rows()     const VSIP_NOTHROW { return backend_.rows();}
135  length_type  columns()  const VSIP_NOTHROW { return backend_.columns();}
136  storage_type qstorage() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return backend_.qstorage();}
137
138  template <typename Block>
139  bool decompose(Matrix<T, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW { return backend_.decompose(m);}
140
141  template <mat_op_type tr, product_side_type ps, typename Block0>
142  Matrix<T>
143  prodq(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b) VSIP_NOTHROW
144  {
145    length_type x_rows, x_cols;
146    if (ps == mat_lside)
147    {
148      x_rows = (qstorage() == qrd_saveq) ? rows() : 
149	       (tr == mat_trans || tr == mat_herm) ? columns() : rows();
150      x_cols = b.size(1);
151    }
152    else
153    {
154      x_rows = b.size(0);
155      x_cols = (qstorage() == qrd_saveq) ? rows() : 
156	       (tr == mat_trans || tr == mat_herm) ? rows() : columns();
157    }
158
159    Matrix<T> x(x_rows, x_cols);
160    backend_.prodq<tr, ps>(b, x);
161    return x;
162  }
163
164  template <mat_op_type tr, typename Block0>
165  Matrix<T>
166  rsol(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b, T const alpha) VSIP_NOTHROW
167  {
168    Matrix<T> x(b.size(0), b.size(1));
169    backend_.rsol<tr>(b, alpha, x); 
170    return x;
171  }
172
173  template <typename Block0>
174  Matrix<T>
175  covsol(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b) VSIP_NOTHROW
176  {
177    Matrix<T> x(b.size(0), b.size(1));
178    backend_.covsol(b, x);
179    return x;
180  }
181
182  template <typename Block0>
183  Matrix<T>
184  lsqsol(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b) VSIP_NOTHROW
185  {
186    Matrix<T> x(columns(), b.size(1));
187    backend_.lsqsol(b, x);
188    return x;
189  }
190
191private:
192  backend_type backend_;
193};
194
195} // namespace vsip
196
197#endif
